commentText: By using this constructor it is possible to perform static initialization of {@link FileSystem}.
codeText: public HdfsOsgiHelper(Map<String, String> fileSystems) {_        try {_            _            ClassLoader cl = getClass().getClassLoader()__            Configuration conf = new Configuration()__            for (String key : fileSystems.keySet()) {_                URI uri = URI.create(key)__                conf.setClass(String.format("fs.%s.impl", uri.getScheme()), cl.loadClass(fileSystems.get(key)), FileSystem.class)__                FileSystem.get(uri, conf)__            }_        } catch (Exception e) {_            LOG.debug(e.getMessage())__        }_    }

commentText: By using this constructor it is possible to perform static initialization of {@link FileSystem}.
codeText: public HdfsOsgiHelper(Map<String, String> fileSystems) {_        try {_            _            ClassLoader cl = getClass().getClassLoader()__            Configuration conf = new Configuration()__            _            conf.setClassLoader(cl)__            for (String key : fileSystems.keySet()) {_                URI uri = URI.create(key)__                conf.setClass(String.format("fs.%s.impl", uri.getScheme()), cl.loadClass(fileSystems.get(key)), FileSystem.class)__                LOG.debug("Successfully loaded class: {}", fileSystems.get(key) )__                FileSystem.get(uri, conf)__                LOG.debug("Successfully got uri: {} from FileSystem Object", uri )__            }_        } catch (Exception e) {_            LOG.debug(e.getMessage(), e)__        }_    }
